player

Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • player.Robot

  • public class Robot
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represnt the Robot, which has a unit, script and the interpreter

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ForthCodeParser myInterpreter
      the interpreter being used to parse myScript
      private java.lang.String myScript
      A string representation of the list of forth commands this robot makes may not be the correct variable type going off of the idea that JSON is represented as a string
      private Unit myUnit
      The unit assigned to this robot

        Parameters:
        newUnit - The type of unit the robot is
        newScript - The script the robot is going to be running
        observer - The robot observer which will be gameManager

      • getMailBoxCount

        public int getMailBoxCount(ForthString destType)
        Get the number of messages in the mailbox of this Robot's Unit's Interpreter of the type 'destType'.
        Parameters:
        destType - The type of targeted Unit
        Returns:
        the number of messages in the mailbox from the Unit destType, or -1 if destType is not found.

      • sendMessageTo

        public boolean sendMessageTo(java.lang.String sentFrom,
                             Value payLoad)
        Put the message 'payLoad' into the mailbox of this Unit corresponding to the Unit who sent the message, 'sentFrom'
        Parameters:
        sentFrom - The type of the Unit who sent the message
        payLoad - The message
        Returns:
        true if the send was successful, false otherwise.
